attributes.action: Do something to improve the living conditions of the soliders in the Army.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the news recently, there have been many reports on the poor standards of living conditions. This should be changes because these people fight for our country, it is the least WE can do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
